releases.title: My Secret Santa
releases.description: A vivacious single mom disguises herself as a man to get a seasonal Santa job at a ski resort, but complications develop as she grows close to the hotel manager.

releases.title: Oh. What. Fun.
releases.description: Claire, an overworked mom, embarks on an impromptu adventure during Christmas, discovering magic in a holiday gone off-script.

releases.title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: The Last Straw
releases.description: The fourth animated adaptation of Jeff Kinney's beloved book series, continuing the comedic adventures of Greg Heffley.

releases.title: Guns Up
releases.description: An ex-cop turned mob henchman tries to leave the mob but his final job goes awry, forcing him to save his family in one hectic night.

releases.title: 5-Star
releases.description: A new docuseries premiering exploring intense real-life stories.

releases.title: Transformers: EarthSpark Specials
releases.description: Special episodes from the animated series Transformers: EarthSpark.

releases.title: Predators
releases.description: A documentary examining the legacy of the TV series To Catch a Predator.

releases.title: Little Disasters
releases.description: A limited series starring Diane Kruger involving a mother who puts her doctor friend in a difficult position after a head injury to her baby daughter.
